name: Timidna's Beginning
description:
Timidna is a young witch on her way to see an old friend from magic school.  But will it be a happy reunion? Find out in this interactive comic!

  • Quick interactive comic/visual novel.
  • Choose different paths and see all 4 mini-endings plus a main ending.
  • Features a short platforming section and a magic duel on broomsticks. 
  • Uses mouse and keyboard.

This is a prequel/demo for my first large project "Timidna's Path" available now!

https://grimdork.itch.io/timidnas-path

Created by Robert "Grimdork" Janca.
